channel.title: CVE Feed for SLiMS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SLiMS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3744|2023-10-02T13:50:31.607Z -- slims -- slims
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery vulnerability in SLims version 9.6.0. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker to send requests to internal services or upload the contents of relevant files via the "scrape_image.php" file in the imageURL parameter.
